Bump to new stable release. Changes:
* Added support for the following GPUs: - GeForce GT 120 - GeForce G100 - Quadro FX 3700M * Fixed a bug that caused Maya to freeze when overlays are enabled. * Fixed an interaction problem with some applications that use memory tracking libraries. * Added support for RG renderbuffers in OpenGL 3.0. * Added support for OpenGL 3.0 floating-point depth buffers. * Fixed a problem that caused Valgrind to crash when tracing a program that uses OpenGL. * A bunch of VDPAU updates.
